parameter 1: This film is a French/Italian co-production. This is the reason why there exists two versions. In general the French version runs ca. 9 minutes shorter in comparison to the Italian version. Many scenes are arranged in a different order. The French version features a scene not included in the Italian version where Dalla Chiesa talks with former colleagues.
parameter 2: There are two VHS Russian language versions, one running only 74 minutes.
parameter 3: There are two VHS Russian language versions, one running only 74 minutes.
parameter 4: There are two VHS Russian language versions, one running only 74 minutes.
parameter 5: The UK version cuts out the scene where Paula strangled a forewoman in bed. The scene faded to black right after she put her hands around her neck and right after that the forewoman is shown dead.  The strangling scene is shown uncut in the video version available in Asia and shown on US cable.
parameter 6: Although rated not under 18 German Video-Release was cut for violence. The cuts are: - a Terrorist burns longer and then falls down the wall - Michael Dudikoff and the others walking besides him - A hostage breaking a Terrorists neck - Micheal Dudikoff killing the Bad Guy with the billiard coe
parameter 7: The UK version cuts out the scene where Paula strangled a forewoman in bed. The strangling scene is shown uncut in the video version available in Asia and shown on US cable.

parameter 9: This Czech film was updated by William Cayton a decade later with sequences involving American boys in New York who looked sufficiently like the Czech originals.
parameter 10: The only uncut video version available in North America is the French language dubbed version titled "Femmes enchaînées: Q.H.S. 3" distributed in the province of Quebec, Canada.
parameter 11: For the Spanish version the nude scenes were re-shot with the women completely dressed.
parameter 12: The U.S. version was distributed in two formats in 1960: as a full length feature film, and in a serialized form designed for daily television airings. The serial version ran in segments approximately 5 minutes long.
parameter 13: The 2004 US R-rated video release also removed the strangulation scene.
parameter 14: The only uncut video version available in North America is the French language dubbed version titled "Femmes enchaînées: Q.H.S. 3" distributed in the province of Quebec, Canada.
parameter 15: The American video is edited of all the explicit sexual content. Any scenes featuring the waist down in any sex scene has been cut. The jacuzzi sex scene and the sex scene that follows on from it has been entirely cut out. The final sex scene in the barn has been edited down, removing wide shots that see the senator in-between Billy's legs having sex, shots from the waist up are the only sexual content seen; to maintain the continuity of the music shots of the CCTV camera and the man watching the sex on the monitor are re-used. The uncut version was broadcast on British television, Channel 5, in the late 90's.
parameter 16: There are two versions of the German dub: The West German (SWF) dub, titled Cinderella '87, and the East German (DEFA) dub. The West German three-hour dub was used for the four-part miniseries aired by SWF as well as a two-part version that omits only the credits and recaps. The East German dub was used for a heavily edited one-part, two-hour movie version. Both dubs are available on DVD.
parameter 17: The only uncut video version available in North America is the French language dubbed version titled "Femmes enchaînées: Q.H.S. 3" distributed in the province of Quebec, Canada.
parameter 18: There are two VHS Russian language versions, one running only 74 minutes.
parameter 19: Rereleased in edited form with all sex scenes removed.

parameter 27: In the UK, the BBFC ordered cuts totaling 2 minutes and 10 seconds in order for the film to secure an '18' rating.
parameter 28: For the Spanish version the nude scenes were re-shot with the women completely dressed.
parameter 29: A sound version was released with new footage of Guitry commenting on the original silent footage.
parameter 30: Rereleased in edited form with all sex scenes removed.
parameter 31: Rereleased in edited form with all sex scenes removed.
parameter 32: The UK Warner video was cut by 1 min 53 secs with edits to a scene where a man caresses Maya and slashes her clothes with a knife.
parameter 33: Although rated not under 18 German Video-Release was cut for violence. The cuts are: - a Terrorist burns longer and then falls down the wall - Michael Dudikoff and the others walking besides him - A hostage breaking a Terrorists neck - Micheal Dudikoff killing the Bad Guy with the billiard coe
parameter 34: The 1986 and 1990 UK video versions were cut by 1 min 38 secs by the BBFC to remove the rape before the fight on the roof and to heavily edit fight scenes including groin kicks, face slaps and a woman's head being hit against a window. Some fight cuts were restored in the 1998 MIA video release though most of the original BBFC edits were retained. The 2006 Anchor Bay DVD had been heavily pre-edited and was missing the BBFC cuts along with some other edits.
parameter 35: The Japanese video/DVD release is uncut by all lower frontal nudity is fuzzed out.
